## What does this PR do?

Describe the changes you made. Keep it concise but clear.

## Why?

Why did you make these changes? What problem does it solve? Link to an issue if there is one.

Closes #(issue number) (if applicable)

## Testing

How did you test this? What should we test to make sure it works?

Example:

- Ran `mosaic install logger@1.0.0` and verified it works
- Ran `cargo test` and all tests pass
- Tested on macOS and Windows

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the project style
- [ ] I've tested my changes locally
- [ ] I've added tests if this is a new feature
- [ ] I've updated docs if needed (README, comments, etc)
- [ ] Commits are clean and descriptive

## Screenshots or logs

If this changes UI or behavior, show us. Paste error logs if relevant.

## Notes

Anything else we should know? Concerns? Open questions?
